game.description: Protect your bed and destroy the enemy beds. Upgrade yourself and your team by collecting Iron, Gold, Emerald and Diamond from generators to access powerful upgrades.

shop.armor.lower: You already have a higher tier item.
shop.hotbar-manager.name: Hotbar Manager
shop.hotbar-manager.lore:
Edit preferred slots for your
items per category.
shop.hotbar-manager.navbar.lore:
Click to change the position
to favor that slot when
purchasing an item this
category or on spawn.
shop.tracker.name: Tracker Shop
shop.tracker.lore:
Purchase tracking upgrade for
your compass which will track
each player on a specific team
until you die.
inv.tracker.title: Purchase Enemy Tracker
tracker.item.name: Track Team
tracker.already.have.team: You already have a tracker for a team!
tracker.team.have.bed: Not all enemy beds are destroyed yet!

item.gamestyle.title: Game style
item.iron.name: Iron
item.gold.name: Gold
item.diamond.name: Diamond
item.emerald.name: Emerald
item.wool.name: Wool
item.wool.lore:
Great for bridging across
islands. Turns into your team's
color.
item.hard-clay.name: Hardened Clay
item.hard-clay.lore: Basic block to defend your bed.
item.glass.name: Blast-Proof Glass
item.end-stone.name: End Stone
item.end-stone.lore: Solid block to defend your bed.
item.ladder.name: Ladder
item.ladder.lore:
Useful to save cats stuck in
trees.
item.wood.name: Wood
item.wood.lore:
Good block to defend your bed.
Strong against pickaxes.
item.obsidian.name: Obsidian
item.stone-sword.name: Stone Sword
item.iron-sword.name: Iron Sword
item.diamond-sword.name: Diamond Sword
item.stick.name: Stick (Knockback I)
item.chainmail-armor.name: Permanent Chainmail Armor
item.chainmail-armor.lore:
Chainmail leggings and boots
which you will always spawn
with.
item.iron-armor.name: Permanent Iron Armor
item.iron-armor.lore:
Iron leggings and boots which
you will always spawn with
item.diamond-armor.name: Permanent Diamond Armor
item.diamond-armor.lore:
Diamond leggings and boots which
you will always spawn with
item.shears.name: Permanent Shears
item.shears.lore:
Great to get rid of wool. You
will always spawn with these
shears.
item.pickaxe-tier-1.name: Wooden Pickaxe (Efficiency I)
item.pickaxe-tier-2.name: Iron Pickaxe (Efficiency II)
item.pickaxe-tier-3.name: Gold Pickaxe (Efficiency III, Sharpness II)
item.pickaxe-tier-4.name: Diamond Pickaxe (Efficiency III)
item.pickaxe.lore:
This is an upgradable item.
It will lose 1 tier upon death!

You will permanently respawn
with at least the lower tier.
item.axe-tier-1.name: Wooden Axe (Efficiency I)
item.axe-tier-2.name: Iron Axe (Efficiency I)
item.axe-tier-3.name: Gold Axe (Efficiency II)
item.axe-tier-4.name: Diamond Axe (Efficiency III)
item.axe.lore:
This is an upgradable item.
It will lose 1 tier upon death!

You will permanently respawn
with at least the lower tier.
item.arrow.name: Arrow
item.bow.name: Bow
item.bow-power.name: Bow (Power I)
item.bow-punch.name: Bow (Power I, Punch I)
item.potion-speed.name: Potion of Speed II (45 seconds)
item.potion-jump.name: Potion of Jump V (45 seconds)
item.potion-invisibility.name: Potion of Invisibility (30 seconds)
item.golden-apple.name: Golden Apple
item.bedbug.name: Bedbug
item.bedbug.lore:
Spawns silverfish where the
snowball lands to distract your
enemies. Lasts 15 seconds
item.dream-defender.name: Dream Defender
item.dream-defender.lore:
Iron Golem to help defend your
base. Lasts 4 minutes.
item.fireball.name: Fireball
item.fireball.lore:
Right-click to launch! Great to
knock back enemies walking on
thin bridges.
item.tnt.name: TNT
item.tnt.lore:
Instantly ignites, appropriate
to explode things!
item.ender-pearl.name: Ender Pearl
item.ender-pearl.lore:
The quickest way to invade enemy
bases.
item.water-bucket.name: Water Bucket
item.water-bucket.lore:
Great to slow down approaching
enemies. Can also protect
against TNT.
item.bridge-egg.name: Bridge Egg
item.bridge-egg.lore:
This egg creates a bridge in its
trail after being thrown.
item.magic-milk.name: Magic Milk
item.magic-milk.lore:
Avoid triggering traps for 30
seconds after consuming.
item.sponge.name: Sponge
item.compact-tower.name: Compact Pop-up Tower
inventory.upgrade.title: Upgrades & Traps
upgrade.sharpness.name: Sharpened Swords
upgrade.sharpness.lore:
Your team permanently gains
Sharpness I on all swords and axes!
upgrade.sharpness.tier-1.name: Sharpness I
upgrade.sharpness.tier-2.name: Sharpness II
upgrade.sharpness.tier-3.name: Sharpness III
upgrade.sharpness.tier-4.name: Sharpness IV
upgrade.protection.name: Reinforced Armor
upgrade.protection.lore:
Your team permanently gains
Protection on all armor pieces!
upgrade.protection.tier-1.name: Protection I
upgrade.protection.tier-2.name: Protection II
upgrade.protection.tier-3.name: Protection III
upgrade.protection.tier-4.name: Protection IV
upgrade.miner.name: Maniac Miner
upgrade.miner.lore:
All players on your team
permanently gain Haste!
upgrade.miner.tier-1.name: Haste I
upgrade.miner.tier-2.name: Haste II
upgrade.forge.name: Iron Forge
upgrade.forge.lore:
Upgrade resource spawning on
your island!
upgrade.forge.tier-1.name: +50% Resources
upgrade.forge.tier-2.name: +100% Resources
upgrade.forge.tier-3.name: Spawn emeralds
upgrade.forge.tier-4.name: +200% Resources
upgrade.heal-pool.name: Heal Pool
upgrade.heal-pool.lore:
Creates a Regeneration field
around your base!
upgrade.heal-pool.tier-1.name: Heal Pool
upgrade.dragon.name: Dragon Buff
upgrade.dragon.lore:
Your team will have 2 dragons
instead of 1 during deathmatch!
upgrade.dragon.tier-1.name: Dragon Buff
trap.blindness.name: It's a trap!
trap.blindness.lore:
Inflicts Blindness and Slowness
for 8 seconds
trap.counter-offensive.name: Counter-Offensive Trap
trap.counter-offensive.lore:
Grants Speed II and Jump Boost
II for 15 seconds to allied
players near your base.
trap.alarm.name: Alarm Trap
trap.alarm.lore:
Reveals invisible players as
well as their name and team.
trap.miner-fatigue.name: Miner Fatigue Trap
no-trap.title: Trap #%number%:
no-trap.lore:
The %word% ennemy who will
come to your base will
trigger the trap!
no-trap.sub-lore:
Buy a trap will store it
there. Its cost will be proportional
to the number of stored traps.
trap.title: TRAP TRIGGERED!
trap.subtitle: Your %trap% has been triggered!
trap.alarm.title: ALARM!!!
trap.alarm.subtitle: Alarm trap set off by %team% team!
bed.broken.title: Bed Destroyed!
bed.broken.subtitle: Your bed is destroyed!
bed.broken.message: §lBED DESTROYED >§7 The bed of %team% has been destroyed
bed.broken.message.player: §lBED DESTROYED >§7 The bed of %team% has been destroyed by %enemy%
chest.cant-open.team: You can't open chests while the team is not eliminated!
